channel.title: [ALREADY ADDED]Link the forum registrations to StopForumSpam
channel.description:
StopForumSpam is a priceless tool for all forums. It is a massive database of spammers and is constantly updated, allowing board administrators to automatically check new registrants' details (username, e-mail, IP) against those in the database.
As an example, ganu874 (the poster of [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,656360.0.html]this topic[/url]) could have [url=http://www.stopforumspam.com/ipcheck/124.253.9.52]been found in the database[/url] and this particular spam post prevented. It's relatively easy to install into a board (minor modifications only) and in my experience it prevents massive amounts of spam.
